alert.note: Alert for Jackson; Lawrence; Washington (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 25 at 9:04PM EST until February 28 at 9:00PM EST by NWS Indianapolis
info.description: ...Forecast flooding changed from Minor to Moderate severity and increased in duration for the following river in Indiana... East Fork White River. .The river stage at Seymour on the East Fork White River in southern Indiana will crest near 17 feet overnight, which is the moderate flood delineation mark. Flooding at Seymour is expected to last through the end of the month. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE MONDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...East Fork White River at Seymour. * WHEN...Until late Monday evening. * IMPACTS...At 17.1 feet, During June 2010, SR 258 east of Cortland was closed for the second time in 10 days. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 6:45 PM EST Friday the stage was 16.9 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 6:45 PM EST Friday was 16.9 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 17.1 feet just after midnight tonight. It will then fall below flood stage late Monday morning. - Flood stage is 12.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/ind. The next statement should be issued Saturday afternoon by around 1245 PM EST.
